website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, zipperless 3-piece luggage set made from state-of-the-art light but hard material and aluminum frame.
pros: Shiny “Germany Bayer PC” material is tough and holds up to travel while being super lightweight, so you can pack more without incurring overweight charges
Interior has divider to keep contents neatly sectioned
TSA locks are easy to set on the aluminum frame
cons: Some issues with parts breaking, but great customer service

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Best luggage set I ever had, and I had lot of them. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Prieto Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic luggage
customer_reviews.text: I received this Coolife luggage yesterday and am blown away by it. It arrived in perfect condition, carefully packaged. It is the most attractive and sturdy luggage I have ever had. I changed the combination on the locks on all three pieces. This was easy and simply involved reading and following the included instructions. I will be using the luggage for the first time this weekend. This luggage is somewhat heavier than typical nylon fabric type luggage, but the extra weight means your belongings will be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael in upstate

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in locking
customer_reviews.text: Folks - I have a fundamental issue with the way this suitcase locks. I have owned dozens of numeric lock devices and have been able to lock the device even when the combination is not correct. These suitcases WILL NOT lock if the combination is not set correctly. This brings me to another point - we would all set the combination to be something different after locking the suitcase so no one should be able to open it. If TSA opens the suitcase with their key - then would the latches snap to open the suitcase ? if so - how would TSA rep close the suitcase ? This may be a fundamental flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Iyernat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look and the reinforced corners!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the “wine red” set of 3 but when it arrived, it had more of a purplish burgundy tint to it than the candy apple I was expecting from both web site photos and customer photos. I received the silver set today and the absolutely LOVE them! They are lightweight but made with an aluminum frame. I will use them in June on an intl. trip. and will place the large one that I will check in the lightweight bag they sent with it, to hopefully avoid scratches.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: A solid durable product for international travel
customer_reviews.text: I travelled with this luggage to Africa. It held up well. It had few scratches afterwards. I like the locking mechanism. You can really pack clothes tightly and still close the locks easily. I was tired of soft shell luggage ripping and hope this holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Meassick

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these sets in various colors & originally was pleased with the purchase. However there has been a few issues with some of the cases but after consulting with the manufacturer they have corrected problems & stood behind their products. I am satisfied with these sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRITTLE MATERIAL!~DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE MATERIAL! First trip and cracked! have no idea if i can even return these, but they are NOT made of a good material :(
customer_reviews.author: peasful mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a set of this luggage two years ago and was so happy I did. They didn’t have any exterior zipper which makes the luggage so secure. This is the second 3-piece luggage I ordered and this time is for my husband. The color is incredibly pretty. This set is even prettier than my old ones. They did a better interior design to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best luggage set I ever had. It looks expensive and easy to store. I took the set to Asian trip and no scratch. I am extremely happy with the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: People help people

customer_reviews.title: Suitcases that fit busy traveler
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases work for my husband who travels around the world for work.
customer_reviews.author: JMuller

customer_reviews.title: A good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight, easy to use, very secure and sturdy. I definitely get compliments on the luggage and it’s very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item, not as advertised, missing carry on
customer_reviews.text: Leaving for vacation Needed Luggage ASAP and received Wrong Item, Not as advertised, and Missing carry on,
customer_reviews.author: christopher p.

customer_reviews.title: Very good luggage in good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Can fit a lot for a carry on size. I'm not a light packer (tons of make up, hairdryer, multiple spare outfits etc) and I can get away with just this carry-on for a 4 day trip. And the best test of quality is even when it's packed full, the wheels are still easy maneuver - they don't catch or feel flimsy. I found this luggage at Macy's but it was twice the cost as amazon. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J G.

product_meta.title: Coolife Luggage Aluminium Frame Suitcase 3 Piece Set with TSA Lock 100% PC (SILVER)
feature_bullets: Combined with luxury aluminum frame and 100% Germany Bayer PC material, features brushed finishing and grinding process, providing long-lasting usage and shining appearance, It also eliminates the trouble of the protective film can’t be peeled off thoroughly.
The bidirectional deep frame TSA locking system for security and peace of mind. Four tough aluminum corner guards offer extra protection for the luggage.
Fully lined, the luggage protects stored items from scratches and snags, while its handy divider helps keep everything neatly separated.
An adjustable 3-step aluminum telescoping handle makes it sturdier and lightweight, which also maintain elegance during usage. High-quality aircraft wheels can be rotated on any solid ground easily.
Worldwide exclusive 3 year warranty.Please note only the frame is aluminium, the main body of thee luggage is made of 100% Germany Bayer PC material.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
